level.text: Contracting Officers have only such authority delegated to them pursuant to ยง 1605.2.

Contracting Officers have discretion to determine the method of procurement, project delivery and type of contract to use for each requirement, unless this function is excluded from the delegation of contracting authority.
Contracting Officers shall determine responsive bids and responsible offerors. A responsive bid is a response to a solicitation which conforms in all material respects to the solicitation.
A responsible offeror has the capability in all respects to perform fully the contract requirements, and the integrity and reliability which will assure good faith performance.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12594, 12598 (December 31, 2010).
